title: SmartSize: Add option to preserve aspect ratio
author: bernd-wechner
body_snippet:
I love SmartSize. I come form using a VNC client where I scaled the remote to 80% so I can see it all on my client screen. I can't see a scale option in mRemoteNG, but I do see SmartSize and it does the job for me, in that I can see the whole of both remote screens. I have two problems with it:

1) It doesn't preserve the aspect ratio, which well, is handy for quick checks on stuff, but not a working mode for me.

2) Because it forces a larger net workspace (on my report machine) into a smal...

iterations.description: The current RDP SmartSize implementation stretches the session content when the window is resized. Adding a 'SmartSize (Aspect)' option to RDPResolutions allows maintaining the aspect ratio (via letterboxing) by dynamically resizing the RDP control.

comments.author: Tragen
comments.snippet: Thanks. I wanted to request the same. Please add this feature

notes:
AI triage (gemini): The current RDP SmartSize implementation stretches the session content when the window is resized. Adding a 'SmartSize (Aspect)' option to RDPResolutions allows maintaining the aspect ratio (via letterboxing) by dynamically resizing the RDP control.
Approach: Add `SmartSizeAspect` to `RDPResolutions`; update `RdpExtensions` to handle the new value; update `RdpProtocol` to handle this resolution by enabling SmartSizing and attaching a resize handler to maintain aspect ratio.
